page.title: 07THE OAK TREE LIGHTS.
page.content: On the 20th of July a serious accident claimed the life of Mrs Joan Usher. It took place on a very dangerous'T' junction where Berry Hill Lane meets with the A617.This was only one of a series of serious accidents. In October 1984 traffic lights were put up to make the junction safer. Since the traffic lights have been put up it has made the junction safer. We did a survey to see how many people travel to school in 1P on Southwell Road.Eight out of twenty-one people travel along there everyday.
